## StateDefinition.auth property

An optional [StateAuthFunc](./paramodel.stateauthfunc.md) that authorizes access to the defined state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
auth?: StateAuthFunc<Scope, State, Pick<Views, Dependencies[number]>>;
```
